title: Chipotle Purée
ingredients: 4 ounces dried chipotle chiles, stems removed
1 cup firmly packed light brown sugar
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a saucepan over high heat.  Bring the mixture to a boil then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 30 to 45 minutes.  Remove from the heat and allow the mixture to cool completely.
Purée the mixture in a blender of food processor until it is “smooth”.
Store in an air tight container in a refrigerator until you’re ready to use it.
Remarks:  There is an easier way.  Buy a can of high-quality chipotles in adobo and purée the contents in a blender.
